Delightful!  The old-world feel, the bilingual staff and the local wine made a superb start to a wonderful evening.  We arrived there early on a week night  around 7pm so we were able to get a table.  Thank you Yelp reviewers for recommending the goat cheese and red peppers.  I am so jealous that Barcelona peppers are better than what we can get at home.   A great value and wonderful experience.
